# GET /v2/appAvailabilities/{id}/relationships/territoryAvailabilities | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

- [ GET /v2/appAvailabilities/{id}/relationships/territoryAvailabilities ](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v2-appAvailabilities-_id_-relationships-territoryAvailabilities)

-  GET /v2/appAvailabilities/{id}/relationships/territoryAvailabilities 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v2/appAvailabilities/{id}/relationships/territoryAvailabilities

App Store Connect API 3.6+## [URL](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v2-appAvailabilities-_id_-relationships-territoryAvailabilities#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v2/appAvailabilities/{id}/relationships/territoryAvailabilities
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v2-appAvailabilities-_id_-relationships-territoryAvailabilities#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Query Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v2-appAvailabilities-_id_-relationships-territoryAvailabilities#query-parameters)

`limit``integer`

 Maximum: `200`## [Response Codes](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v2-appAvailabilities-_id_-relationships-territoryAvailabilities#response-codes)

` 200 OK``[AppAvailabilityV2TerritoryAvailabilitiesLinkagesResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/appavailabilityv2territoryavailabilitieslinkagesresponse)`OK`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 400 Bad Request``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Bad Request`

 Content-Type: application/json ## [See Also](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v2-appAvailabilities-_id_-relationships-territoryAvailabilities#see-also)

### [Managing app and territory availability](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v2-appAvailabilities-_id_-relationships-territoryAvailabilities#Managing-app-and-territory-availability)

[`Read App Availabilty`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v2-appavailabilities-_id_)Get information about your appâ€™s availalbility.[`Read App Availablity Territories`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v2-appavailabilities-_id_-territoryavailabilities)Read the territory availablity for a specific app.[`Create an App Pre-Order`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/post-v2-appavailabilities)Create an app pre-order and set the expected app release date.[`Modify the Territory Availabilty for an App Pre-Order`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/patch-v1-territoryavailabilities-_id_)Update the release territories for your app pre-order.[`End an App Pre-Order`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/post-v1-endappavailabilitypreorders)End the pre-order for your app and release to store immediately.
